Perhaps I should replace math_opt.cast with convert_image_dtype to make sure that returned values always be [0, 65535] when dtype=tf.uint16.
Something like:

def _convert_image_dtype(t):
  if dtype == dtypes.uint8: return t
  return convert_image_dtype(t, dtype)

def _bmp():
  ...
  return _convert_image_dtype(gen_image_ops.decode_bmp(contents))
